content.chorus:
Abnci alheri (shi ne) zamu ci
Abinci ailheri, eh abinci rai
Shinyeye daga wurin Allah eh, abinci
Alheri zamu ci
verses:
Jesu ya dauki gurasa ya ba mu ya ce
Wana shi ne jikin na daza ba adu ka muta ne
Kristi ya dauki koko ya ba mu ya ce
Wana shi ne jininsa dazaba adu ka muta ne

Alto: Gurasa da koko da mu kebi
All: Shi ne jikin, shi ne jini Jesu
Du kwa dan ya karbishi acinkin sarki kiya
Zu chi zal sai murai araba dai
Bass: in kuma kurasai,
All: Zai sai mural araba dai

Ref: Kunzo ku karbishi
Kunzo ku karbishi
Sop: masu bata (ref.)
Ya na da dadi (ref.)
Zai ba kurai (ref.)
Tenon: mai tsarki (ref.)
Mai jinkai (ref.)
Bass: mai sallama (ref.)
